class.rdfs:comment: A sub-grouping of food or drink items in a menu. E.g. courses (such as 'Dinner', 'Breakfast', etc.), specific type of dishes (such as 'Meat', 'Vegan', 'Drinks', etc.), or some other classification made by the menu provider.
class.rdfs:label: MenuSection

schema:hasMenuItem.rdfs:comment: A food or drink item contained in a menu or menu section.
schema:hasMenuItem.rdfs:label: hasMenuItem

schema:hasMenuSection.rdfs:comment: A subgrouping of the menu (by dishes, course, serving time period, etc.).
schema:hasMenuSection.rdfs:label: hasMenuSection
